articles.author: Eileen Ng
articles.title: Southeast Asian nations want to discuss tariffs with Trump as a unified bloc, Malaysia PM says - AP News
articles.description: Malaysian Prime Minister Anwar Ibrahim says Southeast Asian nations will forge a common front to face challenges including economic headwinds from U.S. tariffs and the four-year deadly civil war in Myanmar. Opening an annual summit of the Association of South…
articles.content: KUALA LUMPUR, Malaysia (AP) Southeast Asian nations will forge a common front to face challenges including economic headwinds from U.S. tariffs and a four-year civil war in Myanmar, Malaysian Prime M… [+4116 chars]
